EmailTemplate.subject: Hand Sanitizer Remains on Backorder
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=Valued Customer}},
Thank you for your patience, but due to the on-going supply shortage, your order of hand sanitizer is still on backorder.
Hand sanitizers have been a hot topic in the news lately as numerous products were recalled for containing alcohol not approved for sanitizer use. As a valued Grand & Toy customer, I want to ensure you have the right products to keep your employees safe. We only carry products that are Health Canada certified. I recommend the following alternatives that are in stock and available:
- ECOLogical Gel Hand Sanitizer <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/product/ECOL-HSAN06_ECOLogical_Benzalkonium_Chloride_Gel_Hand_Sanitizer_with_Conditioning_Aloe%2c_Alcohol_Free%2c_300_mL.aspx?cmp=EBNIAMBACKORDERBRUNOEN2&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> - this alcohol-free product is as effective as alcohol-based sanitizers
- Cleace Hand Sanitizer <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/product/HT-HS501_Cleace_Hand_Sanitizer_with_Pump%2c_75_Alcohol_Content%2c_500_mL.aspx?cmp=EBNIAMBACKORDERBRUNOEN2&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> - contains 75% alcohol
Please let me know if there is anything else I can do for you.
Best Regards,
Bruno Châteauvert Inside Account Manager, Federal / Représentant Interne, Équipe Fédérale
